name: Open Data for City Planners
tagline: A collection of open federal datasets that every city planner should know about.
body:
# Beyond the Census 
While city planners have been using open data from the Census for centuries, not all planners are aware of all of the federal government data that is out there that may help inform their local city planning decisions. This site is a collection of United States federal open data that is relevant to city planning.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
